PromptData.prompt:
<<CONTEXT>>
[INST] Extract the following information from this invoice document:
Invoice Data: - Company name - Invoice number - Invoice date - Gross invoice amount - Net invoice amount (if available)
Payment information: - IBAN or SWIFT - BIC - Payment date
Invoice positions: - Description of single postion - quantity (optional) - price per unit - total price
Output the information in a JSON object. Format date values in ISO 8601 (YYYY-MM-DD). Always outputs amounts as a floating-point number with exactly 2 digits without thousand separators. Create only the json object. Do not provide explanations or notes.
Example JSON Object:
{ "InvoiceData": { "Company": "Kraxi GmbH", "InvoiceNumber": "DEBRVPM240017345", "InvoiceDate": "2024-12-31", "InvoiceAmountGross": 1190.00, "InvoiceAmountNet": 1000.00 }, "PaymentInfo": { "IBAN": "DE45 2004 0050 0645 5224 00", "BIC": "COBADEFF208" }, "InvoicePositions": [ { "Description": "ABCDEFG", "Quantity": 1, "UnitPrice": 50.00, "TotalPrice": 50.00 }, { "Description": "HIJKLMN", "Quantity": 2, "UnitPrice": 10.00, "TotalPrice": 20.00 } ] } [/INST]
